item.title: php Dockerfile
item.description: 2019.04.04 # FROM php:7.1.11-fpm-alpine RUN apk add --no-cache freetype libpng libjpeg-turbo freetype-dev libpng-dev libjpeg-turbo-dev \ && apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps autoconf g++ libssh2 openssl openssl-dev make pcre-dev tree curl \ && apk add --no-cache postgresql-dev \ && docker-php-ext-configure gd \ --with-gd \ --with-freetype-dir=/usr/include/ \ --with-png-dir=/usr/include/ \ --with-jpeg-dir=/usr/include/ \ && pecl install mongodb-1.5.2 redis apcu xdebug \ && docker-php-ext-enable mongodb redis apcu xdebug \ && docker-php-ext-install gd pdo_mysql opcache bcmath pgsql pdo_pgsql zip sockets \ && apk del .
